sn47.11:1.2: Atha kho ayasma sariputto yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma sariputto bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn47.11:1.4: Kittavata nu kho, bhante, mahapuriso hoti”ti?
sn47.11:2.2: Idha, sariputta, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.11:2.3: Tassa kaye kayanupassino viharato cittam virajjati, vimuccati anupadaya asavehi.
sn47.11:2.6: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.11:2.7: Tassa dhammesu dhammanupassino viharato cittam virajjati, vimuccati anupadaya asavehi.
